member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.Android.AndroidApp
member.summary: Represents a running Android application.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Android.AndroidApp.#ctor(Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.IAndroidAppConfiguration)
member.summary: Main entry point for creating Android applications. Should not be called directly but instead be invoked through the use of .
member.param: The app configuration. Should be generated from .

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.ConfigureApp
member.summary: Main entry point for Xamarin.UITest. This is a fluent API that allows you to configure your app for either Android or iOS and start it.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.ConfigureApp.DeviceIp(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the ip address of the device. Generally best left unset unless you are running an iOS application on a physical device.
member.param: The ip address of the device.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.ConfigureApp.DevicePort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the port of the device. Generally best left unset.
member.param: The port of the Calabash HTTP server on the device.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.ConfigureApp.Debug
member.summary: Enables debug logging from the test runner.

member.name: P:Xamarin.UITest.ConfigureApp.iOS
member.summary: Specifies that the app is an iOS app.

member.name: P:Xamarin.UITest.ConfigureApp.Android
member.summary: Specifies that the app is an Android app.

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.iOS.iOSApp
member.summary: Represents a running iOS application.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.iOS.iOSApp.#ctor(Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.IiOSAppConfiguration)
member.summary: Main entry point for creating iOS applications. Should not be called directly but instead be invoked through the use of .
member.param: The app configuration. Should be generated from .

member.name: T:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator
member.summary: Represents the iOS specific part of the fluent API. Should not be used directly.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.#ctor(Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator)
member.summary: Part of the fluent API. Should not be used directly.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.Debug
member.summary: Enables debug logging from the test runner.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.DeviceIp(System.String)
member.summary: Configures the ip address of the device. Generally best left unset unless you are running an iOS application on a physical device.
member.param: The ip address of the device.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.DevicePort(System.Int32)
member.summary: Configures the port of the device. Generally best left unset.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.AppBundle(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures the app bundle to use. Will force a run on simulator.
member.param: Path fragments to the directory containing the app bundle. Fragments will be combined with .

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.AppBundleZip(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures the zipped app bundle to use. Will force a run on simulator.
member.param: Path fragments to the directory containing the zipped app bundle. Fragments will be combined with .

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.InstalledApp(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Configures the installed app to use. Will force a run on physical device. Ip address of the device should also be provided.
member.param: The device id found in iTunes.
The bundle id of the installed application.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.StartApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and launches the app on the selected device or simulator.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.ConnectToApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and connects to an already running app. Used for advanced scenarios. Regular users should use instead.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.iOSAppConfigurator.GetConfiguration(Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.StartAction)
member.summary: Builds the iOS app configuration which can be used for input for . The and methods should be used instead unless you have specific needs for the configuration.
member.param: The start action for the configuration. See and methods.
member.returns: An which can used for input for .

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.DeviceSerial(System.String)

member.param: The device serial from adb devices.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.KeyStore(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures the key store that the provided apk file is signed with. A key store is not required, but will ensure that the apk file is pristine and unchanged. If a key store is not provided, UITest will generate a keystore and resign the apk.
member.param: Path fragments to the key store file. Fragments will be combined with .

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.ApkFile(System.String[])
member.summary: Configures the apk file to use.
member.param: Path fragments to the apk file. Fragments will be combined with .

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.StartApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and launches the app on the selected device.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.ConnectToApp
member.summary: Builds the configuration and connects to an already running app. Used for advanced scenarios. Regular users should use instead.
member.returns: The to use in the tests.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.AndroidAppConfigurator.GetConfiguration(Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.StartAction)

member.param: The start action for the configuration. See and methods.

member.name: M:Xamarin.UITest.Configuration.GenericAppConfigurator.GetConfiguration
member.summary: Builds the generic app configuration which contains the shared configuration across platforms. The or properties should be used instead as part of the fluent API unless the configuration is needed.
member.returns: An to be consumed by the platform specific configurations.
